title: All Ball - NBA/China Controversy, Massive Financial Fallout With Darren Rovell; Lakers, Clippers, Warriors Previews
itunes:title: All Ball - NBA/China Controversy, Massive Financial Fallout With Darren Rovell; Lakers, Clippers, Warriors Previews
description:
This week, Gottlieb looks at the rapidly growing controversy between the NBA and China, stemming from Rockets GM Daryl Morey's tweet, and discusses the massive financial fallout with Action Network sports business reporter Darren Rovell, Doug also answers listener questions and gives his impressions of the Lakers, Clippers and why he doesn't think the Warriors are a playoff team. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
